I forgot about the rules of castling, wasn't ready for that.
moves.7... Bg4 8. e5: Probably moved my queen out a bit too early.
moves.8... Qb4 9. a3 Qa5 10. b4 Qa4 11. Qb3: My queen has been rendered useless!
moves.11... b5: At least I can protect her.
moves.12. Re1 Nh6: Time to get back to my defensive.
moves.13. f3 Bf5 14. Bd3 O-O: In hindsight, castling was probably a bad choice.
moves.15. g4 hxg4 16. Bxf5 gxf5 17. e6 fxe6 18: Taking the lead by a few pawns.
moves.21. Rg1 Rf7: Preventing an attack on the bishop.
moves.22. Rxc6: He levels the playing field, from here on out it's downhill for me.
moves.22... Nb6: Attacking move that came a bit too late.
moves.24. Rxf6 Bxf6 25. Nge4+: I've gotten myself into quite a mess here!
moves.25... Bg7 26. Nxf2 e6: My doom has already been sealed.
moves.27. Qg3: I think my major blunder was doing things in the wrong order a number of times; the moves that I made weren't terrible ones, but they were performed at the wrong time, and as soon as I let him take my second pawn I lost control of the game.
